dcterms:creator: Aleksandra Gruca
M. Birk
Joachim Nyborg
Ira Assent
dcterms:description: The Weather4Cast 2023 competition dataset is used for forecasting high-resolution precipitation with an 8-hour lead time using lower-resolution satellite radiance images. It includes satellite and radar images for 7 regions in Europe, spanning from February 2019 to December 2020.
dcterms:title: Weather4Cast 2023 Competition Dataset

dcterms:creator: Seppo Pulkkinen
M. Birk
Joachim Nyborg
Ira Assent
dcterms:description: The PySTEPS dataset is utilized for probabilistic precipitation nowcasting, providing a framework for generating and evaluating precipitation forecasts.
dcterms:title: PySTEPS Dataset

dcterms:creator: Georgy Ayzel
Maik Heistermann
Tanja Winterrath
dcterms:description: The RainyMotion dataset serves as an open benchmark for radar-based precipitation nowcasting, providing a framework for evaluating optical flow models.
dcterms:title: RainyMotion Dataset

dcterms:description: The OPERA Radar Network Dataset provides radar data for evaluating rainfall predictions, but specific details about the dataset are not provided in the references.
dcterms:title: OPERA Radar Network Dataset
